actions.name: check_new_saved_track
actions.description: Check if a new song was saved

actions.name: check_new_episode
actions.description: Check if there is a new episode in the given show

reactions.name: createPlaylist
reactions.description: Create a playlist with the given name, the given description and if it's public or not

reactions.name: add_items_to_playlist
reactions.description: add the given music to the given playlist

reactions.name: add_track_to_queue
reactions.description: add the given track to the list of the music in the player (premium only)

reactions.name: set_volume
reactions.description: set the volume in the player with the given value (premium only)

reactions.name: start_song
reactions.description: start the current song in the queue (premium only)

reactions.name: pause_song
reactions.description: pause the current song in the queue (premium only)

reactions.name: next_song
reactions.description: launch the next song in the queue (premium only)

reactions.name: previous_song
reactions.description: launch the previous song in the queue (premium only)
